text: Ate uha alaha hi hai, jisa ne baga paida kite, kujha chatari'am te carhe ate kujha nahim carhe ate khajuram de darakhata te kheta jinham de fala vakhare vakhare hude hana ate jaituna ate anara jihare milade julade vi hana ate bhina vi. Jadom uha fala pakana, kha'o inham di paidavara ate alaha da hisa vi katana de dina ada karo. Bekara na jana devo, ki alaha bekara karana vali'am nu pasada nahim karada
